amendment.description: To require a Comptroller General report on closure of Department of Defense dependent elementary and secondary schools and commissary stores.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3204 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3204 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S7152-7160; text as modified: CR S7157-7158) To require a Comptroller General report on closure of Department of Defense dependent elementary and secondary schools and commissary stores.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3204 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3204 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Clinton.
